ferromtm.tools package¶

Submodules¶

ferromtm.tools.parallelize module¶

ferromtm.tools.parallelize.is_sge()[source]¶
ferromtm.tools.parallelize.parallel(function, partype='gridmap')[source]¶

Decorator to parallelize problems.

function : the function that will be parallelized. The FIRST
argument is the one to be iterated on (in parallel). The other arguments are the same in all the parallel runs of the function (they can be named or unnamedarguments).

partype : the module used for parallelisation (gridmap, scoop or multiprocessing)

A paralelized function. DO NOT NAME IT THE SAME AS THE INPUT FUNCTION.
